snippet.title: The Ultimate Tax Dodgers: Internet Retailers
snippet.description:
The Ultimate Tax Dodgers: Internet Retailers
By Gary Weiss 06:00 AM EST 12/06/11
Companies including Amazon and eBay think they're above paying taxes and expect Americans to subsidize them.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11332875/1/the-ultimate-tax-dodgers-internet-retailers.html
